page.title: 05Farming in the Laughton Area
page.content: There are many farms in our area growing lots of different arable crops. One of the nicest farmers we know is Mr. Farnsworth. We told him that we were surveying a twelve kilometre block, so he said that he would take us on the back of a trailer all around the area. It took almost the whole day to see everything. Mr. Farnsworth also talked to us in class and told us all about farming. We asked lots of questions, and these are the things we were able to find out. Farming is improving all the time. Machinery is so good that fewer men can farm large areas. These machines can also work on wet and difficult land. New seeds are also being produced which grow better crops.
